member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BellaSiciliaPeppolToBcRequest
member.summary: Orchestrator for processing Peppol UBL documents for Bella Sicilia Reads Peppol files from the configured source directory, determines document type, and delegates to the appropriate handler (purchase invoice, purchase credit note, sales invoice, or sales credit note)

member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BellaSiciliaPurchaseCreditNoteToBcRequest
member.summary: Transforms Peppol vendor credit notes to Business Central purchase credit memos for Bella Sicilia

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BellaSiciliaPurchaseCreditNoteToBcRequest.ConvertPeppolToPurchaseCreditMemoJson(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationRoot,System.String,SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.PeppolDocument,SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EventLog)
member.summary: Converts a Peppol vendor credit note document to a Business Central purchase credit memo JSON representation

member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BellaSiciliaPurchaseInvoiceToBcRequest
member.summary: Transforms Peppol vendor invoices to Business Central purchase orders for Bella Sicilia

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BellaSiciliaPurchaseInvoiceToBcRequest.ConvertPeppolToPurchaseInvoiceJson(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationRoot,System.String,SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.PeppolDocument,SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EventLog)
member.summary: Converts a Peppol vendor invoice document to a Business Central purchase order JSON representation

member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BellaSiciliaSalesCreditNoteToBcRequest
member.summary: Transforms Peppol client credit notes to Business Central sales credit memos for Bella Sicilia
Converts a Peppol client credit note document to a Business Central sales credit memo JSON representation

member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BellaSiciliaSalesInvoiceToBcRequest
member.summary: Transforms Peppol client invoices to Business Central sales orders for Bella Sicilia
Converts a Peppol client invoice document to a Business Central sales order JSON representation

member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EventLog
member.summary: EventLog writes messages to Debug output, optionally persists them to a database, and optionally sends an email alert via SMTP when configured.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EventLog.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: EventLog writes messages to Debug output, optionally persists them to a database, and optionally sends an email alert via SMTP when configured.

member.name: T:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.AuthHelper
member.summary: Simple MSAL-based client credentials helper. Reads configuration keys under `Auth`: - TenantId - ClientId - ClientSecret - Scope (optional, defaults to Business Central scope)

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.AuthHelper.GetAccessTokenAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Acquire an access token. Supports two modes: - service (client credentials) - user (device code flow / delegated) Token is cached until expiry.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.AuthHelper.CreateHttpClientAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Create an HttpClient whose default request headers include a Bearer token. Note: token is fetched once at creation time. For long-running programs consider using a DelegatingHandler that refreshes tokens transparently.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.GtinValidator.IsValidGtin(System.String,SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.GtinType@)
member.summary: Valideer of de invoer een geldige GTIN (EAN-13 of EAN-14) is.

member.summary: Interne helper: valideer lengte en checkdigit.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.GtinValidator.HasValidCheckDigit(System.String)
member.summary: Controleer of de laatste digit overeenstemt met de berekende checkdigit.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.JsonHelper.ReplacePathValues(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Past de tekstwaarde aan van een parameter in een JSON-string met eenvoudige dot-notatie (geen array indices). Gooit een exception als de target geen string is of niet bestaat (tenzij allowCreate = true).

member.summary: Enumeration of supported Peppol document types

member.summary: Invoice from supplier to customer (TypeCode 380)

member.summary: Credit note from supplier to customer (TypeCode 381)

member.name: F:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.PeppolDocumentType.VendorInvoice
member.summary: Invoice from customer to supplier (TypeCode 380, but in reverse direction)

member.name: F:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.PeppolDocumentType.VendorCreditNote
member.summary: Credit note from customer to supplier (TypeCode 381, but in reverse direction)

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.VatSanitizer.Clean(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verwijdert alles behalve A-Z en 0-9, forceert uppercase country code als aanwezig. Optioneel kan je een defaultCountryCode (bv. "BE") meegeven als er geen code is.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.VatSanitizer.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[^A-Z0-9]
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [^0-9A-Z].

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BeVatValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^BE[0-9]{10}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "BE".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 10 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.BeCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^BE[0-9]{10}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "BE".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 10 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.DeCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^DE[0-9]{9}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "DE".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 9 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.FrCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^FR[0-9A-Z]{2}[0-9]{9}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "FR".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Z] exactly 2 times.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 9 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.NlCountryValidator.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^NL[0-9]{9}B[0-9]{2}$
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match the string "NL".
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 9 times.
○ Match 'B'.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 2 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SpuntiniBCGateway.Services.EuVatValidator.TryValidate(System.String,System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Probeert landcode af te leiden uit string. Als afwezig kun je defaultCountryCode meegeven.
